DOC.brief_summary: This study examine activity 2 different dos PF-06372865 panel evoke pain test carry 0.5 10 hour follow oral dose healthy male subject .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Analgesic Effects PF-06372865 Healthy Volunteers Using Evoked Pain Endpoints
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 18 55 year , inclusive . Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12 lead ECG clinical laboratory test . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Evidence personally sign date informed consent document indicate subject inform pertinent aspect study . Subjects willing able comply schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , study procedure . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( eg , gastrectomy ) . A positive urine drug screen .
